Module analysis.classes

Class analysis.

Function Summary
  get_class_definitions(cls)
Return a dictionary mapping names to nodes for the given class 'cls'.
  get_class_layout(cls)
Return a list of tuples of the form (name, nodes) indicating the layout of definitions for the given class 'cls'.
  get_instance_definitions(cls)
Return a dictionary mapping names to definitions for instances of the given class 'cls'.
  get_instance_layout(cls)
Return a list of tuples of the form (name, definition-nodes) indicating the layout of the structure of instances of the class 'cls'.
  issubclass(cls1, cls2)
Check to see if 'cls1' is a subclass of 'cls2' (or the same class), returning a true value if this is the case; otherwise a false value is returned.

Function Details

get_class_definitions(cls)

Return a dictionary mapping names to nodes for the given class 'cls'.

get_class_layout(cls)

Return a list of tuples of the form (name, nodes) indicating the layout of definitions for the given class 'cls'.

get_instance_definitions(cls)

Return a dictionary mapping names to definitions for instances of the given class 'cls'.

get_instance_layout(cls)

Return a list of tuples of the form (name, definition-nodes) indicating the layout of the structure of instances of the class 'cls'.

issubclass(cls1, cls2)

Check to see if 'cls1' is a subclass of 'cls2' (or the same class), returning a true value if this is the case; otherwise a false value is returned.
